description_firefox.message: A WebExtension to quickly open about:* pages.

description_chrome.message: A WebExtension to quickly open chrome://* pages.

options_showDisabledButtons.message: Show privileged pages (currently canâ€™t be opened from the menu)

url_firefox_.message: Displays version and build information and links to the contributors, licensing information and build configurtion

url_firefox_about.message: Provides an overview of all about: pages available for your current Firefox version

url_firefox_accounts.message: Page used by the Sync feature

url_firefox_buildconfig.message: Displays the configuration and platform used to build Firefox

url_firefox_cache.message: Displays information about the memory, disk, and appcache

url_firefox_checkerboard.message: Switches to the checkerboarding measurement page, which allows to detect checkerboarding issues

url_firefox_config.message: Provides a way to inspect and change Firefox preferences and settings

url_firefox_credits.message: Lists all contributors to the Firefox project

url_firefox_crashes.message: Lists all crashes, which happened during the runtime of Firefox (in case the user enabled the crash reporter)

url_firefox_customizing.message: Switches to the customization page, which allows to customize Firefox' UI

url_firefox_debugging.message: Switches to the Developer Tools debugging page, which allows you to debug add-ons, tabs and Service Workers

url_firefox_devtools-toolbox.message: Shows the content of the devtools

url_firefox_downloads.message: Displays all downloads done within Firefox

url_firefox_healthreport.message: Displays performance information of Firefox (in case the user enabled the health report)

url_firefox_home.message: Start page of Firefox when opening a new window

url_firefox_memory.message: Provides a way to display memory usage, save it as report and run the GC and CC

url_firefox_mozilla.message: Special page showing a message from The Book of Mozilla

url_firefox_newtab.message: Start page when opening a new tab

url_firefox_performance.message: Displays memory and performance information about Firefox subprocesses/add-ons/tabs

url_firefox_privatebrowsing.message: Start page when opening a private window

url_firefox_robots.message: Special page showing notes about robots

url_firefox_sessionrestore.message: Session restoration (displayed after a Firefox crash)

url_firefox_sync-log.message: Displays a synchronization protocol related to the Sync feature

url_firefox_sync-tabs.message: Lists tabs available for synchronization related to the Sync feature

url_firefox_telemetry.message: Displays telemetry data collected and sent to Mozilla while Firefox is running (in case the user enabled telemetry)

url_firefox_welcomeback.message: Information page displayed after Firefox is reset
